start.text: You're grooving at a far-out 1960s music festival when suddenly, a UFO lands on the main stage. Technicolor aliens emerge, promising to take three groovy humans on a cosmic adventure. The lead alien, sporting a tie-dye spacesuit, points at you and says, 'You look hip, cat! Choose your cosmic journey:'

choices.text: Hop into the UFO's lava lamp engine room?
Join the alien band for an intergalactic tour?
Enter the UFO's psychedelic meditation chamber?

1.text: You dive into the lava lamp engine room, where blobs of glowing liquid power the ship. The alien engineer hands you a control panel shaped like a flower and says, 'Far out! Where to, earthling?'

choices.text: Steer towards the Groovy Galaxy, home of endless music festivals?
Navigate to the Kaleidoscope Nebula for a mind-bending light show?
Plot a course to the Cosmic Cafeteria for some out-of-this-world munchies?

2.text: You grab a guitar shaped like a DNA strand and join the alien band. The lead singer, with antennas that change color to the beat, asks you to choose the first stop on your tour:

choices.text: The Planet of Eternal Woodstock, where the music never stops?
The Melody Moons, where songs shape the landscape?
The Rhythmic Rings of Saturn, for a cosmic battle of the bands?

3.text: You enter the meditation chamber, filled with floating cushions and shimmering walls. A wise alien guru materializes and offers you three paths to cosmic enlightenment:

choices.text: Tune in to the universe's vibrations through sonic meditation?
Expand your mind by merging with the ship's psychic network?
Embark on a spiritual journey through time and space?

1A.text: You arrive at the Groovy Galaxy, where every planet is a different music festival. The aliens ask you to choose which planet to visit first:

choices.text: The Woodstock World, eternally stuck in August 1969?
Funkopolis, where the streets are made of vinyl records?
Discotopia, a planet-sized dance floor under a giant mirror ball?

1B.text: The Kaleidoscope Nebula swirls around the ship, creating mind-bending patterns. The alien crew asks you to help navigate through the cosmic light show:

choices.text: Ride the Rainbow Rapids, surfing on beams of colored light?
Dive into the Prism Pools, swimming through liquid spectrums?
Soar through the Aurora Arches, looping through magnetic color fields?

1C.text: At the Cosmic Cafeteria, you're presented with a menu of impossible foods. The alien chef asks for your order:

choices.text: A gravity-defying sundae that floats off your spoon?
Multi-dimensional spaghetti that changes flavor with each bite?
A sandwich made from bread that grows on the plate?

2A.text: On the Planet of Eternal Woodstock, you're asked to headline the main stage. Choose your act:

choices.text: Perform a duet with a hologram of Jimi Hendrix?
Lead a 1000-piece band of time-traveling musicians?
Play an instrument that translates thoughts into music?

2B.text: On the Melody Moons, your music physically shapes the environment. What do you play?

choices.text: A bluesy riff that creates a landscape of rolling hills?
A psychedelic rock anthem that grows a forest of crystal trees?
A funky bassline that builds a city of sound waves?

2C.text: At the Rhythmic Rings of Saturn, you face off against alien bands. Choose your secret weapon:

choices.text: A theremin that controls Saturn's weather?
A drum kit made from miniature planets?
A keytar that shoots musical comets?

3A.text: You begin the sonic meditation, attuning your mind to cosmic frequencies. You can now:

choices.text: Communicate with celestial beings through harmonic telepathy?
Perceive the music of the spheres, hearing the universe's symphony?
Shape reality by humming at specific frequencies?

3B.text: Merging with the ship's psychic network, you become one with the crew. You can now:

choices.text: Pilot the ship using only your thoughts?
Access the collective knowledge of every alien on board?
Project your consciousness to any point in the universe?

3C.text: Your spiritual journey through time and space begins. Where do you want to explore first?

choices.text: The moment of the universe's creation?
A future where humans and aliens coexist on Earth?
The inner space of your own consciousness?

end.text: Wow, what a trip! Your cosmic adventure has expanded your mind in ways you never thought possible. As the UFO returns you to the music festival, you realize only a minute has passed on Earth. The aliens wave goodbye, leaving you with a tie-dye shirt that shimmers with actual starlight. Ready to groove back into reality, or take another trip through the cosmos?
